channel.title: Mac Os on Zhaoyu Li
channel.description: Recent content in Mac Os on Zhaoyu Li

item.title: Compiling Tensorflow on Mac OS
item.description: Table of Contents My Environment Configuration Install Command Line Tool 7.3 Clone the TensorFlow repository Install Bazel Install Python dependencies Install Tensorflow for GPU prerequisites Configure the installation Build the pip package Generate wheel file and install it In the release note of tensorflow v1.1.0, there is a section about Mac GPU support: TensorFlow 1.1.0 will be the last time we release a binary with Mac GPU support.
